text: The Nova Bus LFS HEV is a diesel electric hybrid version of the Nova Bus LFS. It was launched at the 2006 CUTA Trans-Expo in Toronto. The first examples went to STO at the beginning of 2007. The Nova Bus LFS HEV has Diesel Electric Hybrid Propulsion. 9625 NIS.jpg|A NIS Nova Bus LFS HEV 2021 New Flyer LFS HEV 9657 on the Bx7 Route.jpg|Nova Bus LFS HEV #9657 powered off 9624 NIS.jpg|Nova Bus LFS HEV (Roof) Category:Low-floor buses
title: Nova Bus LFS HEV
